title: Objective SQL
desc: The object-oriented, adaptive SQL for modern apps - query anything from the plain JSON object, to the client-side IndexedDB, to the server-side DB.

features.title: Meet ArrowJoins!
features.desc: Write better JOINS with the shorter and self-documenting, bidirectional arrow syntax!

features.title: The Fullstack Data QL
features.desc: Speak the same familiar SQL both on the server side and, this time, on the client side.

features.title: The Adaptive Data QL
features.desc: Switch between data structures without rewriting a line of query. Stay consistent!

features.title: Or Speak Programmatically
features.desc: ...with the powerful set of succint, promise-based APIs that do the job!
